Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes an optional local tax exemption for affordable multi-family housing, to be implemented based on regional recommendations developed by the division of housing and community renewal
Summary: Establishes an optional local tax exemption for affordable multi-family housing, to be implemented by cities, towns and villages based on recommendations developed by the division of housing and community renewal for each economic development region.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to establishing an optional local tax exemption for affordable multi-family housing
